attributes.action: scrap parental responsiblitys for offenders who have commited crimes against children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current legislation states sex offenders who have commited sex offences against children still have parental responsiblitys for any children they have concieved. 



With your help we are starting this petition which will hopefully bring about a change in the current laws and prevent sex offending parents/guardians from having any rights whatsoever over children.



Why should the innocent parents/guardians have to pay legal fees to prevent the abusers from having access or rights over their children? This is blatantly cruel and costly for those to whom the damage has been done.
lets get this law changed to automatically scrap their parental responsibilities
